AssignedToId.description: The user assigned to the care benefit verify request.

AuthorizedPrescriptionId.description: The authorized prescription associated with the care benefit verify request.

BenefitCategoryCodeId.description: The benefit category code associated with the care benefit verify request.

BillablePrdEndDateTime.description: The date and time when billable period ended.

BillablePrdStartDateTime.description: The date and time when billable period started.

CareProgramEnrolleeId.description: The care program enrollee associated with the care benefit verify request.

CareProgramId.description: The care program associated with the care benefit verify request.

CoverageBenefitId.description: Identifies the set of services covered by the insurance plan.

InitialFillDuration.description: The initial fill duration of the authorized prescription.

InitialFillQuantity.description: The initial fill quantity of the authorized prescription.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

MemberPlanId.description: Identifies the member plan that includes the benefit item being verified.

Name.description: The name of the care benefit verification request.

OriginalPrescriptionId.description: The original prescription associated with the care benefit verify request.

PayerId.description: The payer associated with the care benefit verify request.

PlanId.description: The purchaser plan from the member plan associated with the care program enrollee.

PrescriberId.description: The prescriber associated with the care benefit verify request.

PrescriptionMedicationId.description: The medication code or medication name of the authorized prescription.

PriorityCodeId.description: The priority code associated with the care benefit verify request.

ProviderId.description: The provider of the care benefit verify request.

RelatedCareBnftVerifyRequestId.description: The original care benefit verify request from which the current request is cloned.

RequesterId.description: The requester associated with the care benefit verify request.

ResponseBody.description: Full JSON response from external system.

ResponseContentType.description: The content type of the response from the external system.

ResponseLength.description: The length of the response from the external system.

ResponseName.description: The name of the response from the external system.

StatusReason.description: The reason for the specified status of the care benefit verification request.

VerificationMode.description: Specifies the mode of verification used in the care benefit verify request.
